sense.def:
To pass someone or something
pomeni iti mimo neke osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: We passed the New Hotel.
Please let us pass.
I was just passing by and I saw your car.

sense.def:
To pass in a particular direction
pomeni premakniti se ali iti v določeno smer.

seg.quote: They passed through an arched gateway.
The pipe passed under the city sewer.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes something through, over, or round something
, potisne nekaj, na primer en konec vrvi, skozi drugo stvar, čeznjo ali okoli nje.

seg.quote: Pass the string under the hook.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes an object to someone
, da predmet določeni osebi.

seg.quote: Pass the sugar, please.
She passed me her glass.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
passes from one person to another
, tisto dobi druga oseba namesto prve.

seg.quote: Her property passes to her next of kin.

sense.def:
Ko neko obdobje
passes
, se zgodi in konča.

seg.quote: The time seems to have passed so quickly.
The crisis passed.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
ADJUNCT
or
-ING

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes a period of time
, z določeno dejavnostjo zapolni neko obdobje.

seg.quote: Men pass their lives farming their small plots of land.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
ERG VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
passes a test
ali
is passed
, za tisto velja, da izpolnjuje pričakovana merila in je sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: I passed my driving test in Holland.
You have to get 120 marks out of 200 to pass.
This drug has been passed by the US Food and Drug Administration.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje, ki odločajo,
pass a new law or a proposal
, se uradno strinjajo z novim zakonom ali predlogom ali ga potrdijo.

seg.quote: Many of the laws passed by Parliament are never enforced.

sense.def:
Kadar sodnik
passes sentence on someone
, pove, kako bo določen človek kaznovan.

Kadar nekaj
passes as a particular thing
ali
passes for a particular thing
, je sprejeto kot tisto drugo, čeprav nima vseh pravih lastnosti tiste stvari.

seg.quote: ...that brief period that passes for summer in those regions.
A strip of space 4 feet wide passed as a kitchen.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
passes without comment or reaction
ali
passes unnoticed
, tega nihče ne opazi, se ne odzove na tisto ali ničesar ne pripomni o tistem.

seg.quote: Social change was so slow that it passed unnoticed.

sense.def:
Pri izpitu ali preskusu je
a pass
ocena, ki pove, da smo izpit uspešno opravili.

seg.quote: She got a grade A pass in physics.

sense.def:
A pass
je tudi dokument, ki človeku dovoljuje, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: I have a pass to go from New York to East Hampton.

sense.def:
A pass
je ozek prehod med dvema gorama.

seg.quote: ...the Khyber Pass.

sense.def:
To pass away
pomeni umreti;

Kadar človek
passes one thing off as another
, prepriča druge, da je stvar, o kateri govori, tisto drugo.

seg.quote: The man who made the cabinet passed it off as an antique.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes on something
, tisto, kar je dobil, dá nekomu drugemu.

seg.quote: He handed a sheet to Lee to pass on to me.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes out
, se onesvesti.

Kadar človek
passes over a topic
, o tisti témi ne govori.

seg.quote: He passed over the events of that week.

sense.def:
Kadar skupina ljudi
pass something round
ali
pass it around
, vsaka oseba tisti predmet prime in ga izroči naslednji.

seg.quote: Pass the matches round.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
passes up an opportunity
, priložnosti ne izkoristi.

seg.quote: I wouldn't have passed up the chance for a million dollars.
